content: the wander tank top sweater is the perfect transition piece to go from spring to summer this pattern uses the single_crochet mesh stitch in vertical row to create an open textured look the top is made in two identical panels that are seamed together and an easy fphdc/bphdc ribbing is then added at the neck arms and bottom edge the wander crochet tank top is written for 5 sizes s m l xl 2xl and is rated as an intermediate level project when i set out to design this pattern i knew i wanted to play around with the idea of mashing up a sweater with a tank top i wanted it to have the cozy look of a sweater but also the warm-weather wearability of a tank top my solution give it the chunky textured ribbing of your favorite winter sweater but with the lightweight drape-y-ness of an open mesh stitch i think it works this listing is for a printable pdf version of this crochet pattern visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern with ads pattern download - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions helpful schematics and step-by-step pictures - this pattern will be available to you in the form of a digital file pdf skill level intermediate this pattern involves color changes as well as increasing and decreasing and working front post/back post stitches you will also need to be able to follow the pattern instructions for your size measurments this pattern is written for 5 sizes s m l xl 2x to fit bust sizes 32 36 40 44 48 inches materials you will need a size i 5 5mm crochet hook for this project you will also need approximately 480 500 520 560 600 yards of worsted weight yarn for the main color and approx 100 - 120 yards of worsted weight in a contrasting color for the stripes share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #wandertanktop hashtag to show off your new project copyright the wander sweater tank top pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
